snippet: The Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency said that the virus in a computer at its Tsukuba Space Center was found to be secretly collecting data and sending it outside the agency.
abstract: Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency says computer virus at its Tsukuba Space Center was found to be secretly collecting data and sending it outside the agency.
lead_paragraph: The Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency said that the virus in a computer at its Tsukuba Space Center was found to be secretly collecting data and sending it outside the agency.

headline.seo: Japan’s Space Agency Says Rocket Information Was Stolen by Computer Virus
headline.main: Japan’s Space Agency Says Rocket Information Was Stolen by Computer Virus
